name: Tailscale
description: Zero config VPN. Installs on any device in minutes, manages firewall rules for you, and works from anywhere.
short_desc: The easiest, most secure way to use WireGuard and 2FA.
author: Â© Tailscale Inc.

form_fields.label: TS_ACCEPT_DNS > Accept DNS configuration from the admin console. Not accepted by default.
TS_AUTH_ONCE > Attempt to log in only if not already logged in. False by default, to forcibly log in every time the container starts.

TS_AUTHKEY > An auth key used to authenticate the container. It is also possible to use an OAuth client secret. To mark a containerized node as ephemeral append ?ephemeral=true to the auth key or OAuth client secret.
TS_HOSTNAME > Use the specified hostname for the node.
TS_ROUTES > Advertise subnet routes. To accept advertised routes, use TS_EXTRA_ARGS to pass in --accept-routes.
TS_SERVE_CONFIG > Accepts a JSON file to programatically configure Serve and Funnel functionality. Located in app-data/tailscale/data/config/*
TS_EXTRA_ARGS > Any other flags to pass in to the Tailscale CLI.
TS_USERSPACE > Enable userspace networking, instead of kernel networking. Enabled by default.
